findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality may lead to complications if the information becomes outdated or irrelevant, potentially causing disputes over what information remains confidential.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing a party to seek injunctive relief without posting bond may expose the other party to undue risk, as it prevents them from having a financial safeguard in case of wrongful claims.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: The restriction on assignment without consent can limit flexibility for both parties in the event of business changes, potentially leading to operational difficulties.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
